lead_paragraph: The Kremlin chastised the Russian national soccer team on Wednesday, describing the behaviour of some players as "a conceited disgrace" after they were filmed partying in a Monaco nightclub after crashing out of the Euro 2016 tournament.

headline.print_headline: Kremlin Chastises Russian Soccer Team Over Champagne Party
headline.main: Kremlin Chastises Russian Soccer Team Over Champagne Party

snippet: The Kremlin chastised the Russian national soccer team on Wednesday, describing the behaviour of some players as "a conceited disgrace" after they were filmed partying in a Monaco nightclub after crashing out of the Euro 2016 tournament....
